user.content: Lately, my shoulders, neck, and lower back have been feeling sore. Are there any methods to relieve this?

assistant.content: You can try using a foam roller for a five-minute massage before bed at night, which helps relax the tight muscle groups in your shoulders, neck, and back.

assistant.content: Why not try setting a reminder every 45 minutes to stand up and move around for 5 minutes, doing some simple neck and shoulder rotations? This way, it won't interrupt your workflow while effectively alleviating the issues caused by prolonged sitting.
